mapper.select: select * from freeboard_tbl_board where f_title like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') OR f_content like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') OR f_writer like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') order by f_no ASC limit #{startrow},#{endrow}
select count(*) from freeboard_tbl_board where f_title like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') OR f_content like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%') OR f_writer like CONCAT('%',#{find},'%')
mapper.update: update freeboard_tbl_board set f_hit = f_hit+1 where f_no=#{f_no}
